GENERAL.FURTHERINFORMATION: A vehicle was reported on a sidewalk, ~y~blocking it~w~. Try to speak with the driver.

DIALOGUES.DIALOGUE: ~b~You:~w~ Hi there. I'm afraid you can't idle here.
~r~Suspect:~w~ I'm not moving.
~b~You:~w~ I'm going to need you to-
~b~You:~w~ Stay there for me. What's up?
~r~Suspect:~w~ Well, nothing much. Is something wrong?
~b~You:~w~ This is a sidewalk. You need to move.
~r~Suspect:~w~ I'm waiting for someone, they'll be here any minute now.
~b~You:~w~ It wasn't a request. This is a sidewalk, people are using it.
~r~Suspect:~w~ I'll go park somewhere else.
~b~You:~w~ Hi there. You are parked on a sidewalk, did you know that?
~r~Suspect:~w~ Yes, but I am just waiting for a friend. Can I stay?
~b~You:~w~ I'm afraid not.
~r~Suspect:~w~ Well where else can I go?
~b~You:~w~ A parking place or similar, there are plenty around here.
~r~Suspect:~w~ Understood. Sorry, won't happen again.
~b~You:~w~ Hi there. Why are you parked here?
~r~Suspect:~w~ I'm delivering something.
~b~You:~w~ Delivering what? You don't look like a delivery driver if you don't mind me saying.
~r~Suspect:~w~ Uh, something that I need to do.
~b~You:~w~ So, you are parked here, waiting to deliver something?
~r~Suspect:~w~ Look, I need to deliver this, for my family. Please.
